title: [Catacombs, Sewers]
description: Interestingly, the walls have been crafted with stacked bones and skulls in artsy, symmetric patterns.

Interestingly, the walls have been crafted with stacked bones and skulls in artsy, symmetric patterns.  Even more unusual than the walls is a massive statue, meticulously crafted into a detailed image of a rat.  The statue stands at least ten feet high and looms in the center of this chamber.  The raised platform that the statue resides on is a pile of skulls and bones.  Located on the base of the platform is a plaque.
